survey_name: Home Solar Panel Installation Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from homeowners who have recently installed solar panels to evaluate their satisfaction with the installation process, system performance, and overall experience with the provider.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall solar panel installation process?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels effectively.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall solar panel installation process?

questions.question_text: Which of the following factors influenced your decision to install solar panels? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to understand key decision-making drivers.

script.question_text: Which of the following factors influenced your decision to install solar panels? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the professionalism of the solar panel installation team?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to capture nuanced feedback on service quality.

script.question_text: How would you rate the professionalism of the solar panel installation team?

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any issues with your solar panel system since installation?
questions.client_notes: Follow up with Q5 if respondent selects 'Yes'.

script.question_text: Have you experienced any issues with your solar panel system since installation?

questions.question_text: Please describe the issue(s) you have experienced with your solar panel system.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed feedback on specific issues.

script.question_text: Please describe the issue(s) you have experienced with your solar panel system.

questions.question_text: How responsive has the solar panel provider been in addressing any issues or concerns?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to measure responsiveness of customer support.

script.question_text: How responsive has the solar panel provider been in addressing any issues or concerns?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend this solar panel provider to others?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to gauge overall satisfaction and likelihood to recommend.

script.question_text: Would you recommend this solar panel provider to others?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the solar panel installation process or provider?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather constructive feedback for improvement.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the solar panel installation process or provider?
